Description.Text:
Position The hotel is situated in a quiet position, directly on the beach.
Restaurant Air conditioned restaurant. Families with younger children are allowed to come in restaurant before the meal times, because the restaurant offers to prepare special meals also for the younger children, just like vegetable soups.
Outside The hotel is situated in a building of the 1930 which is whole built in ART NOUVEAU STYLE.
More Informations Credit cards accepted: Eurocard/Mastercard and Visa. The hotel offers 4 meeting rooms and can host max 240 persons. The hotel organizes different events from 01/06/13 to 07/09/13 as followes: Typical Dinner on saturday; Aperitif on sunday; Wine-tasting at sunset on the beach once a week; Piadina making (italian bread making) once a week; Flamb√® evening once a week; Welcome Drink on Saturday.
BEACH SERVICE: includes 1 sun-umbrella per room + 1 sun-bed per adult person; From 29/06 to 06/09 for those who book HB or FB treatment and book a stay of minimum 7 nights will be included beach service; From 01/06/13 to 28/06/13 and from 07/09/13 to 14/09/13 for those who book HB or FB treatment regardless of the length of stay will be included beach service.
Sweet and salty buffet breakfast. At lunch and dinner: during the months of july and august from buffet. Choice between 5 first dishes, 5 second dishes, mixed buffet of apetizers and vegetables, fruit or home made dessert.
CHECK IN from 2.00pm. CHECK OUT until 10.00am.
